meanings.definition: A plant of the mint family with brightly colored leaves.
meanings.sent1: The coleuses in the garden added a pop of color to the landscape.
meanings.sent2: She bought a few coleuses to decorate her balcony.
meanings.sent3: The coleuses in the yard seemed to be having a colorful party.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of coleuses was a vibrant painting in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The bright coleuses swayed gently in the breeze, catching everyone's eye.

meanings.definition: The plural form of coleus, a type of plant.
meanings.sent1: The gardener carefully tended to the coleuses in the greenhouse.
meanings.sent2: They planted many coleuses in the flowerbeds.
meanings.sent3: The coleuses on the windowsill chatted happily with each other.
meanings.sent4: The coleuses in the pots were a cheerful bunch.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant coleuses stood out among the other plants, creating a beautiful display.
